title: Gamend
description: Open source game server with authentication, users, lobbies, groups, friends, notifications, leaderboards, server scripting and admin portal

features.title: Authentication & Users
features.description: Email, Magic-link, OAuth, JWT and Session. Register, login, reset password and verify email.

features.title: Lobbies & Leaderboards
features.description: Customizable settings and real-time updates. Server-authoritative leaderboards.

features.title: Friends & Groups
features.description: Request, block, and lists with real-time presence and notifications. Communities with public, private, and hidden visibility.

features.title: Server Scripting & Server Scheduling
features.description: Server logic using Elixir scripts. Schedule tasks for automated server operations.

features.title: Persistence & Caching
features.description: SQLite (in memory) and PostgreSQL. In-memory or distributed caching.

features.title: Web & Integrations
features.description: Built-in web UI and admin portal. Supports Discord, Apple, Google, Facebook, Steam.
